TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CatalogZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase

summary.span: 作為在網頁上裝載 控制項之網頁組件控制項集合中的主要控制項。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合，區域是在網頁上包含 Web 組件控制項的區域。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. Web 組件區域區域的控制項，也就是類型所建立的設計成包含作為其他控制項。A Web Parts zone is created by a zone control, which is a type of designed to contain other controls. 區域的主要功能是配置的控制項，其中的內容，並提供這些控制項通用的使用者介面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 如需區域和 Web 組件的應用程式中的使用方式的一般資訊，請參閱基底類別，和[Web 組件控制項設定概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). Web 組件控制項的主要功能是它們根據其喜好設定，讓使用者修改 （或個人化） 網頁和未來的瀏覽器工作階段儲存個人化的設定。A key feature of Web Parts controls is that they allow end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 組件頁面的其中一個層面，包括新增控制項或其他伺服器控制項加入網頁組件頁面。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes the ability to add controls or other server controls to a Web Parts page. 控制項提供的清單或類別目錄的使用者可以將頁面加入的控制項。The control provides a list or catalog of controls that users can add to a page. 控制項是其中一個基本的控制項，Web 組件控制項集合中。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. 它衍生自類別，且其行為的大部分都繼承自該類別。It derives from the class, and most of its behavior is inherited from that class. 類別基本上會加入至基底類別區域的範本，這是實作的介面。The class essentially adds to the base class a zone template, which is an implementation of the interface. 區域範本可讓開發人員以宣告方式新增控制項中的頁面保存格式的區域。The zone template enables developers to declaratively add controls to a zone in the page persistence format. > [!IMPORTANT] > A只能包含區域控制項和相反地，控制項僅可以位於衍生自區域類別，例如。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones that derive from the class, such as . A就會看到控制項只有當使用者切換網頁至目錄顯示模式 ()。A control becomes visible only when a user switches a Web page to catalog display mode (). 類別目錄可包含數種控制項。A catalog can contain several types of controls. 每個控制項是一種包含使用者可以加入至網頁之伺服器控制項的容器。Each control is a type of container that contains the server controls users can add to the page. 根據它們包含的伺服器控制項所在的控制項而有所不同。The controls differ according to where the server controls they contain are coming from. 下表摘要說明提供何種伺服器控制項包含 Web 組件控制項集合，而每個控制項，控制項。The following table summarizes the controls provided with the Web Parts control set and, for each control, what kind of server controls it contains. |控制項Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||維護參考至頁面已關閉的控制項。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 這些控制項可以由使用者重新開啟 （已重新新增到網頁）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含控制項中的 Web 組件類別目錄，在網頁標記中宣告的參考。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 這些控制項可以由使用者加入至 Web 網頁。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供使用者定義檔案上傳的使用者介面 (具有的 XML 檔案。Web 組件延伸模組，並指定的格式，其中包含狀態資訊） 目錄中，控制項，可以新增至網頁的控制項。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file (an XML file with a .WebPart extension and a specified format that contains state information) for a control to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page.| 因為類別加入至其基底類別行為只能將區域的範本，其具有較少的成員。Because the class adds only a zone template to the behavior of its base class, it has few members. 建構函式是預設建構函式，則為，您可以初始化的新執行個體類別。The constructor is a default constructor; with it, you can initialize a new instance of the class. 屬性取得或設定參考包含區域控制項的物件。The property gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the controls for the zone. 方法非常重要。The method is critical. 它會覆寫基底的方法建立的所有集合區域範本內所包含的控制項。It overrides the base method to create the collection of all controls contained within the zone template. > [!NOTE] > 中的按鈕UI 需要用戶端指令碼，才能順利運作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果瀏覽器中，停用指令碼，使用者將無法執行動作，透過UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更在網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 自訂的檔案與原始碼控制項，以及自訂匯入全文檢索目錄，並加入至 Web 網頁的控制項。A file with the source code for a custom control, and a custom control that is imported by the catalog and added to the Web page. - 宣告的使用者控制項，而自訂的網頁控制項。A Web page that declares the user control, and the custom control. - 如何執行此範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the example. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分包含自訂程式碼和控制項。The second part of the code example contains the code for the custom and controls. 程式碼控制項示範如何在繼承自類別，並自訂它的屬性建構函式中設定一些預設屬性值。The code for the control demonstrates how to inherit from the class and customize its properties by setting some default property values in the constructor. 原始碼也會示範如何建立自訂名為類別`TextDisplayWebPart`。The source code also demonstrates how to create a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 這是與關聯的控制項。Web 組件描述的檔案要匯入做為這個程式碼範例的一部分。This is the control associated with the .WebPart description file that you will import as part of this code example. 使用匯入描述檔案之後控制項在網頁上，您可以新增`TextDisplayWebPart`頁面上，完全預先設定為指定描述檔中的控制項。After you import the description file by using the control on the Web page, you'll be able to add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, fully pre-configured as specified in the description file. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯，因此如果您想要執行此範例，如此一來，名稱的原始程式檔，並且將它加入至 App_Code 子資料夾的 Web 應用程式的根目錄。This code example uses dynamic compilation, so if you want to run the example this way, name the source code file and add it to an App_Code subfolder of your Web application's root directory. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含控制項的網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 它包含`Register`指示詞的使用者控制項，以及另一個原始程式檔使用自訂控制項。It contains a `Register` directive for the user control, and another for the source file with the custom controls. 請注意，在第二個指示詞，它無法命名組件，因為此範例不使用組件，它會使用動態編譯原始程式碼放置於 App_Code 子資料夾。Note that in the second directive, it does not name the assembly, because the example does not use an assembly, it uses dynamic compilation with the source code placed in the App_Code subfolder. Web 網頁會宣告控制項和其子系內``項目，它會宣告控制項。The Web page declares a control, and within its child `` element, it declares a control. 雖然這是標準的 ASP.NET 控制項，它將具有完整 Web 組件的功能在執行階段，因為控制換行的任何伺服器控制項放置在與物件，以便在其他伺服器控制項可以參與 Web組件的應用程式。While this is a standard ASP.NET control, it will have full Web Parts functionality at run time, because the control wraps any server control placed in a with a object, so that other server controls can participate in Web Parts applications. 也宣告在此區域是自訂控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`。Also declared in this zone is the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 請注意這個控制項沒有的屬性`ExportMode="All"`在其上宣告。Notice that this control has an attribute of `ExportMode="All"` declared on it. 這可讓您匯出。Web 組件描述的檔案，其中包含可以匯入其他使用者用來將預先設定的控制項加入至其他網頁的控制項屬性值。This enables you to export a .WebPart description file that contains the property values of the control, which can be imported by other users to add the pre-configured control to other Web pages. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用 Web 組件應用程式匯出的描述檔案的使用者控制項，您也必須啟用 Web 應用程式中的匯出功能，藉由新增`enableExport="true"`屬性``元素 (的子系``元素) 的 Web.config 檔案中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 預設為停用匯出，因此如果尚未啟用您的應用程式匯出，編輯 Web.config 檔案，並且立即執行它的作業。Export is disabled by default, so if you not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 網頁也會宣告自訂控制項並在其中，``包含項目控制項。The Web page also declares the custom control and, within it, a `` element that contains an control. 使用者將匯入在執行階段中使用這個控制項。自訂的 web 組件描述檔控制項。The user will use this control at run time to import the .WebPart description file for the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogzonevb.aspx#2)] 現在，執行程式碼範例。Now run the code example. 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一個步驟是匯出。Web 組件描述檔`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The first step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 按一下 （標題列中向下箭號表示），在自訂控制項上的動詞命令功能表，然後按一下**匯出**。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 請依照下列指示，儲存控制項的描述檔案。Follow the instructions to save a description file for the control. 開啟。Web 組件描述檔案在編輯器中，並編輯標題文字內容的值。Open the .WebPart description file in an editor, and edit the value of the title property text. 尋找``具有屬性的項目`name="Title"`，並編輯包含開頭和結尾之間的標題文字``標記。Find the `` element that has the attribute `name="Title"`, and edit the title text that is contained between the opening and closing `` tags. 現在關閉網頁上，並編輯網頁原始檔編輯器中。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 刪除``控制宣告項目，然後儲存並關閉檔案。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. 載入網頁瀏覽器中一次。Load the Web page again in a browser. `TextDisplayWebPart`控制項不應該出現，因為您已經將它移除。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**，將頁面切換至目錄模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 請注意，自訂控制項就會出現，以及與控制項。Notice that the custom control appears, along with the control. 按一下**瀏覽**按鈕來尋找。您針對匯出的 web 組件描述檔`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。Click the **Browse** button to locate the .WebPart description file that you exported for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 您可以按一下**上傳**，選取 匯入的控制項，旁邊的核取方塊，然後按一下 **新增**將它加入至頁面。You can click **Upload**, select the check box next to the imported control, and click **Add** to add it to the page. 按一下**關閉目錄**頁面返回一般瀏覽模式。Click **Close Catalog** to return the page to normal browse mode. 匯入的控制項現在應該會出現在頁面中，而且會出現在標題列控制項的標題應該是您加入的標題文字。Web 組件描述檔。The imported control should now appear in the page, and the title that appears in the title bar of the control should be the title text you added to the .WebPart description file.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

para.span: 您可以建立自訂類別，如果您想要更充分掌控的轉譯和類別目錄 UI 行為。

span.span: You can create custom classes if you want more control over the rendering and behavior of the catalog UI.

para.span: 如果您不需要提供控制項的使用者能夠加入控制以宣告方式，則您可直接繼承自類別。

span.span: If you do not need to provide users of your control with the ability to add controls declaratively, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您想要啟用以宣告方式加入控制項，simples 方法是繼承自類別，因為它提供必要的區域範本。

span.span: If you do want to enable controls to be added declaratively, the simples approach is to inherit from the class, because it provides the essential zone template.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法和用法的方法，即可加入自訂控制項，如果您想對新增更多的程式設計控制自訂控制項加入您的區域.

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you can override the method and use the method to add custom controls to a , if you want greater programmatic control over adding custom controls to your zone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為控制項實作區域範本通常是以宣告方式使用，您很少需要建立使用類別的新執行個體建構函式。Because the control implements a zone template, it is usually used declaratively and you will seldom need to create a new instance of the class using the constructor. 不過，如果您繼承自類別來建立自訂區域，您可能想要使用建構函式初始化它的某些屬性值，並自訂其外觀。However, if you inherit from the class to create a custom zone, you might wish to use the constructor to initialize some of its property values and customize its appearance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用建構函式自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the constructor in a custom control. 建構函式用來初始化控制項的某些預設屬性值。The constructor is used to initialize some default property values for the control. 下列程式碼會示範自訂類別建構函式宣告上方。The following code shows the custom class with the constructor declared near the top. 針對完整的程式碼和指示，才能設定及執行範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to set up and run the example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection CreateCatalogParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateCatalogParts () As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 建立區域中宣告之每個 型別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of each type that is declared in the zone.

returns.span: ，其中含有區域中所有 控制項的參考。

span.span: A with references to all the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法，因為當使用者切換至目錄顯示模式的頁面，這個方法會建立所有組成 Web 組件類別目錄的控制項。The method is a critical method because when a user switches a page to catalog display mode, this method creates all the controls that make up the Web Parts catalog. 方法中的類別與網頁組件控制項集合可以建立繼承自任何伺服器控制項提供類別。The method in the class provided with the Web Parts control set can create any server control that inherits from the class. 因此，如果您建立自訂控制並宣告內的頁面上控制項，當使用者切換到目錄模式的頁面這個方法會建立您的控制項。So, if you create a custom control and declare it on a page within a control, this method will create your control when a user switches the page to catalog mode. 不過，基於各種原因您可能想要控制針對方法。However, for various reasons you might want control over the method. 您可以建立只有某些控制項。You might want it to create only certain controls. 例如，假設您建立一組自訂的有一致的外觀和屬於單一產品或組織的控制項。For example, suppose you create a set of custom controls that have a consistent appearance and belong to a single product or organization. 如果您想網頁程式開發人員會受限於在目錄中，使用這些自訂控制項，則您應該繼承自類別，覆寫方法，並允許方法建立的自訂控制項與相同類型的控制項。If you want page developers to be limited to using those custom controls in a catalog, then you should inherit from the class, override the method, and allow the method to create only controls of the same type as your custom controls.

exception.span: 目前的 控制項並沒有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定樣板，以頁面保存格式將子控制項包含在 控制項之中。

span.span: Gets or sets a template to contain child controls within a control in page persistence format.

value.span: ，做為區域中子控制項的容器。

span.span: An that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考類型的範本，用來包含區域中的控制項。The property references a template of type that is used to contain the controls in the zone. 區域範本可讓網頁開發人員宣告他們想要使用在持續性格式，而不是需要以程式設計方式建立的所有控制項的控制項。The zone template enables page developers to declare the controls they want to use in persistence format, rather than having to create all the controls programmatically. Set 存取子屬性呼叫方法，這會強制集合區域樣板中宣告的重新整理頁面上的控制項。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls that are declared in the zone template on the page to be refreshed. 這可確保控制項區域所參考的集合會保留目前每當使用者變更實際頁面上宣告的範本中的控制項。This ensures that the collection of controls referenced by the zone remains current whenever a user changes the controls actually declared within the template on the page.

para.span: 如果您想要建立自訂區域，但是您打算建立以程式設計方式控制，而不是可讓網頁開發人員將其宣告，您執行不需要區域範本支援，您可以直接繼承自類別。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone, but you plan to create the controls programmatically rather than allowing page developers to declare them, you do not need zone template support, and you can inherit directly from the class.
